game.name: Jeger
game.genres: Action, Adventure, Indie, RPG, Simulation, Early Access
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Partial Controller Support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Explore a mysterious nature reserve through the eyes of the ranger Yeremey. Find your father, confront poachers, and uncover the secrets of a corporation threatening the wilderness. Survival, crafting, and a dynamic ecosystem await you.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Explore a mysterious nature reserve through the eyes of the ranger Yeremey. Find your father, confront poachers, and uncover the secrets of a corporation threatening the wilderness. Survival, crafting, and a dynamic ecosystem await you.
